channel.title: Machine Learning on Data Science Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Data Science Wiki

item.title: Transfer Learning - Sneak Peak
item.description: Transfer Learning is a field of Machine Learning that study how to gain knowledge from data and generalize to new related domains. Since the theme is so broad, we start by its definition and a shortened explanation on methods and scenarios, focusing on Deep Learning and finishing with an exploration of its advantages and limitations.
